feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and quotation marks similarly.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit similar lexical and grammatical features in terms of word choice and grammar.

feature3.explanation: Both texts have relatively similar sentence structures and coherence.

feature4.explanation: Both texts share a common tone and narrative style.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the overall assessment of the features, there is a moderate to high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
